Miscellaneous Highlights: Dejounte Murray fractured his left hand and will be sidelined for an extended period of time.
Others: The Pelicans suffered a significant blow as Murray was a key offseason acquisition and delivered a solid double-double performance in his debut.
New Orleans Pelicans vs Chicago Bulls: Dejounte Murray likely sustained the injury with 2:21 left in the fourth quarter of the season-opening win against the Chicago Bulls.
Dejounte Murray: Murray finished with 14 points on 4-of-15 shooting, including 0-of-3 from beyond the arc, while contributing eight rebounds, 10 assists and a steal in his Pelicans debut.
Chicago Bulls: The New Orleans Pelicans suffered a significant blow as star guard Dejounte Murray was ruled out for 'an extended period of time' after fracturing his left hand on Wednesday in a 123-111 season-opening win against the Chicago Bulls.
